content.en: Network selection algorithms: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve network selection in heterogeneous wireless networks. These algorithms, such as parallel fuzzy logic and AHP, extension theory and fuzzy analytic hierarchy process, and multiple attribute decision making, aim to provide scalable, adaptable, efficient, and accurate solutions for network selection. They consider factors like service characteristics, user preferences, energy efficiency, and uncertain or fuzzy network attribute values to ensure suitable network selection and improved quality of service.
content.da: Algoritmer til netværksvalg: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre netværksvalg i heterogene trådløse netværk. Disse algoritmer, såsom parallel fuzzy logic og AHP, extension theory og fuzzy analytic hierarchy process, og multiple attribute decision making, sigter mod at levere skalerbare, tilpasningsdygtige, effektive og nøjagtige løsninger til netværksvalg. De tager hensyn til faktorer som tjenesteegenskaber, brugerpræferencer, energieffektivitet og usikre eller fuzzy netværksattributværdier for at sikre passende netværksvalg og forbedret servicekvalitet.
